1727346 THE PUNJAB MUNICIPAL CORPORATION LAW (EXTENSION TO CHANDIGARH) AMENDMENT ACT, 2000
ACT NO. 50 OF 2000 [ 11th December, 2000.]
An Act to amend the Punjab Municipal Corporation Law (Extension to Chandigarh) Act, 1994.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- first Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
10286 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Punjab Municipal Corporation Law (Extension to Chandigarh) Amendment Act, 2000.
8393 2 Amendment of Act 45 of 1994.- In the Punjab Municipal Corporation Law (Extension to Chandigarh) Act, 1994, in Part II of the Schedule, in section 4, in sub- section (3),-
649850 ain clause (ii), for the words" municipal administration.", the words" municipal administration; and" shall be substituted;
1339485 bafter clause (ii), the following clause shall be inserted, namely:- " (iii) the member of the House of the People representing the constituency which comprises wholly or partly, the municipal area, with the right to vote.".
SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
